detail_desc: Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined bikini top with wide elastic trims and no fasteners.
Blouse in a crinkled weave containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a frill trim around the armholes. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves, high slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar and French front. Long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Slight V-neck and ventilating mesh sides.
Fully lined printed swimsuit with an interactive motif on the front.

Short, wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Hairband in elasticated velour with an appliqué on top.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with frills at the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dungarees in washed, slightly stretchy cotton twill with frills at the top and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, a regular waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Ankle-length dress in airy, mosaic-patterned organic silk. Deep V-neck with narrow, padded stitching around the neckline and parts of the waist. Long, wide, voluminous sleeves that taper at the cuffs. Straight cut in a softly draping, relaxed fit with a slit at the front. Lined in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend.
A-line nursing top in soft Tencel™ lyocell jersey with long sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in soft twill made from cotton and Tencel™ lyocell with wide peak lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with a detachable, adjustable buttoned strap at the cuffs. Front pockets, a wide, detachable belt with metal eyelets at the waist, and a single back vent. Half-lined.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a racer back. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in imitation leather with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft slub jersey with narrow shoulder straps, buttons at the top and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Quilted jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, wrapover front with concealed press-studs, and welt side pockets. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Sleep gown in soft, organic cotton jersey with an all-over print. Long sleeves with lapped shoulders and a concealed zip at the bottom.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from cotton and silk.
Straight-cut blouse in a slightly stretchy weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Dress in glittery tulle with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves in double-layered tulle and a gathered seam at the hem with a flared flounce. Lined.
Boxy jumper knitted in a supersoft alpaca and wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with wide sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and an embroidered motif at the top. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hems.
Block-patterned silk handkerchief. Size 33x33 cm.
Jacket in soft fleece with contrasting colour details, a stand-up collar and mesh-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Unlined.
Set with three pairs of studs and four ear cuffs made of metal in various sizes and designs.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Long raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Shorts in soft jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and frills down the sides.
Fully lined swimsuit with appliqués in the shape of flowers at the top and hips, narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in patterned slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with beaded embroidery, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Ribbed trim around the neckline.
Shoulder bag in leather with suede details. Flap with a metal snap lock, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx 8x17x23 cm.
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline, one dropped shoulder, buttons down one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless lace dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck, seam with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a lace-trimmed hem. Jersey-lined bodice and sewn-in inner skirt.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Lace bra with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Wide adjustable shoulder straps and a slightly wider fastener at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and gently rounded hems.
Off-the-shoulder top in a plumeti cotton weave with a frill-trimmed top, short, wide sleeves and a rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.

prod_name: BEANIE KNIT CHUNKY FUR POM POM
detail_desc: Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved top in slub jersey with a round neck, lace yoke and straight hem.
Short jersey dress with short sleeves and a bell-shaped skirt.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped, diagonal front pockets and an inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Leggings in jersey with a shimmering pattern. Elasticated waist.

Knee-length chiffon dress with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with gathers and covered elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated waist. Partly lined in satin.
Top in organic cotton jersey with narrow elastication around the neckline and short raglan sleeves.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Knee-length wrap dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the front. Adjustable spaghetti straps, a seam and tie belt under the bust and an asymmetric skirt. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with worn details with reinforcement on the inside. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, a fake fly and raw-edge hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Cap in felted fabric containing some wool with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back.
Jersey T-shirt in an cotton blend.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with a pearly plastic bead. The zinc content of the rings is recycled.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes along the short sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with embroidery on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
